casebody.data:
DUNN, et al.
v.
STATE of NC, et al. No. 605PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 15, 2007. Gregory P. Roney, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. John R. Wylie, Charles R. Watkins, David J. Guin, Birmingham, AL, Tammy Stokes, Savannah, GA, Stephen Dampier, Jack E. Thornton, Jr., Winston-Salem, Arthur T. Susman, for Dunn, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of August 2007 by Plaintiffs for Admission of Counsel Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of October 2007."
